Datasource.Parameter: (select * from planet_osm_polygon order by z_order) as leisure
(select * from planet_osm_polygon where landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' or "natural"='land' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_roads order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_point where amenity IS NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL) as amenity

(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,tourism,learning,amenity,place,name,ref,oneway,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads
